Package Clients.OnLineTool

Class Summary
ACSStatus This class is encharged of the ACS Status information comming from opserver.
AlmaStatus This class is encharged of the Alma Status information comming from opserver.
AntennaStatus This class is encharged of the Alma Status information comming from opserver.
ContainerStatus This class is encharged of the Alma Status information comming from opserver.
CorbaStatus This class is encharged of the Alma Status information comming from opserver.
OpServerConnection This class is responsible to the connection with OpServer, here decide if there is connection with the opserver to use his information or there is not connection with the opserver, then the application must to use the offline information.
ServerClient This class is a listener of opserver, so the opserver send information to this listener and the listener save the information on the corresponding HashMap, is there is not new information, then the status to display is the same of the last iteration
SubsystemsStatus This class is encharged of the Alma Status information comming from opserver.
